verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1909>of<s%> the things which we have <S%G3004>spoken<s%> this is the <S%G2774>sum:<s%> We <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> a high <S%G749>priest,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> is <S%G2523>set<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the right <S%G1188>hand<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2362>throne<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3172>Majesty<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3772>heavens;<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3570>now<s%> hath he <S%G5177>obtained<s%> a more <S%G1313>excellent<s%> <S%G3009>ministry,<s%> by how <S%G3745>much<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G3316>mediator<s%> of a <S%G2909>better<s%> <S%G1242>covenant,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> was <S%G3549>established<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G2909>better<s%> <S%G1860>promises.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> finding <S%G3201>fault<s%> with <S%G846>them,<s%> he <S%G3004>saith,<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G2064>come,<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2532>when<s%> I will <S%G4931>make<s%> a <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1242>covenant<s%> <S%G1909>with<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>with<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%> of Judah: <S%G2455><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> is <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1242>covenant<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> I will <S%G1303>make<s%> with <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> I will <S%G1325>put<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3551>laws<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G1271>mind,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1924>write<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2588>hearts:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> I will <S%G2071>be<s%> to <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1519>a<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> to <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1519>a<s%> people: <S%G2992><s%>
